sense.def:
To be jealous
pomeni čutiti jezo ali zagrenjenost do nekoga, ker ima tisto, kar si želimo sami.

seg.quote: I often felt jealous because David could go out when he wished.
They may feel jealous of your success.

sense.def:
To be jealous
pomeni čutiti, da moramo poskusiti obdržati nekaj, kar imamo, ker mislimo, da nam bo to nekdo vzel.

seg.quote: She was a very jealous woman.
He was jealous of his wife and suspected her of adultery.
They were jealously guarding their independence.
